title: ANNOUNCEMENT; International Wild Card All-Stars hosted in Australia, in November
body:
The 2015 allstar event has been announced, and on the side of that, the International Wild Card All-stars has been announced, as an event to be hosted in Australia in November.

The Allstars event will be hosted in December 10 - 13, however there will be an Internatonal representative for the Wildcard regions, which will be decided in November.

Link; http://na.lolesports.com/articles/2015-all-star-event

Discuss

replies.body: yay, we get to get thrashed on our own home turf.
